ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Competency in reading Old Persian Cuneiform script; Old Persian phonology, morphology, and grammar; dealing with interpretative issues concerning the corpus of texts; historical background to the texts we were reading.

I learned to read Old Persian and understand more about the Achaemenid Empire. It definitely improved my translation abilities and my understanding of indo-european languages and their grammar system.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The course was fast-paced and highly interactive with readings in each session; the instructor was extremely knowledgeable and provided guidance on both interpretation and background. The pace was challenging at times, and I wasn't necessarily aware of how independent we were expected to be in tackling the grammatical issues of the language (though we were warned!)
The course was great - most of the time was spent working on our translations and going over them which was very helpful.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes. While learning Old Persian is only very obliquely connected to my research interests, it has provided both a fun challenge to learn and, more profoundly, a different viewpoint on approaching research into ancient languages. If Old Persian was closer to one's research interests I can see only more benefits from taking the course.
I would recommend this course, however, it was quite intense and involved a lot of work.

narratives.question_text: The Canvas course site allowed me to identify and access required course materials easily.
